value:
$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|I am honored to finally meet you,
Prince Ephraim. I've been hearing
stories about you for some time...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|Ah, well. Nothing too disparaging,
I hope. At least now I can do away
with the formalities...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|Hah, you are just as they say.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|All that aside, General Cecilia, I have
a question for you... Does "Mage
General" just mean magic general?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|I suppose you could say that, yes...
Although, I find myself teaching magic
more often than using it in battle.$k$pI taught Lilina some basic spells,
for example...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|Ah, so...a Mage General is mostly a
magic teacher, then?$k$pI suppose I do see some similarities
between you and my lance instructor,
now that I consider it.$k$pHey, I'm no good with magic, but...
do you think I could learn if I studied
under you? I bet I could!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|Unfortunately, no.
You have no talent for magic.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|...N-none at all? Oh. Well...I'd be
lying if I said that wasn't what I had
expected to hear.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|Forgive my bluntness, but it would
be cruel of me to lead you down that
path knowing it would be a dead end.$k$pEveryone has a role, though, so
worry not. You, after all, are meant
for the throne...$k$pAnd there your natural talent as a
leader of people will truly blossom.$k$pBut for now, we must attend to the
matter at hand. What are your next
orders, Commander?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_WinterFes18,Face|...I should have expected nothing less.$k$pFor now, retreat is our best option!
We'll find them again after we
regroup with Eirika.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_WinterFes18,Face|Understood, Commander.$k$p$Sbs150|
